title: The BUG of katarina, plz help
body: when i play the champ Katarina, i cant use the hotkeys Q B and R after i killd others, I restart the game and PC twice but still have that problem, I search it on google it said just died for once and then it will be ok, and I tired, it's true, but damn, it's waste my time and let me lose a game which I should won that. Please fix that bug, i saw others also have this bug before

replies.body: Aww thought you were going to say the champ is broken, not your keyboard...

Do you have a keyboard that will change bindings automatically?

If not, then it's a bug, and thus belongs on [the bug board](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
